 41  Declarations

 44namespace vsip
 45{
 46
 47namespace impl
 48{
 49
 50// List of implementation tags to consider for QR.
 51
 52typedef Make_type_list<
 53#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_CVSIP
 54  Cvsip_tag,
 55#endif
 56#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_SAL
 57  Mercury_sal_tag,
 58#endif
 59#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_CBE_SDK
 60  Cml_tag,
 61#endif
 62#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_HAVE_LAPACK
 63  Lapack_tag,
 64#endif
 65  None_type // None_type is treated specially by Make_type_list; it is
 66            // not put into the list.  Putting an explicit None_type
 67            // at the end of the list lets us put a ',' after each impl
 68            // tag.
 69  >::type Qrd_type_list;
 70
 71
 72
 73// a structure to chose implementation type
 74template <typename T>
 75struct Choose_qrd_impl
 76{
 77#ifdef VSIP_IMPL_REF_IMPL
 78  typedef Cvsip_tag type;
 79  typedef Cvsip_tag use_type;
 80#else
 81  typedef typename Choose_solver_impl<
 82    Is_qrd_impl_avail,
 83    T,
 84    Qrd_type_list>::type type;
 85
 86  typedef typename ITE_Type<
 87    Type_equal<type, None_type>::value,
 88    As_type<Error_no_solver_for_this_type>,
 89    As_type<type> >::type use_type;
 90#endif
 91};
 92
 93
 94
 95// Qrd traits.  Determine which QR types (no-save, skinny, full) are
 96// supported.
 97
 98template <typename QrT>
 99struct Qrd_traits
100{
101  static bool const supports_qrd_saveq1  = QrT::supports_qrd_saveq1;
102  static bool const supports_qrd_saveq   = QrT::supports_qrd_saveq;
103  static bool const supports_qrd_nosaveq = QrT::supports_qrd_nosaveq;
104};
105
106} // namespace vsip::impl
107
108/// QR solver object.
109
110template <typename              T               = VSIP_DEFAULT_VALUE_TYPE,
111	  return_mechanism_type ReturnMechanism = by_value>
112class qrd;
113
114
115
116// QR solver object (by-reference).
117
118template <typename T>
119class qrd<T, by_reference>
120  : public impl::Qrd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_qrd_impl<T>::use_type>
121{
122  typedef typename impl::Choose_qrd_impl<T>::use_type use_type;
123  typedef impl::Qrd_impl<T,true, use_type> base_type;
124
125  // template <typename>
126  friend struct impl::Qrd_traits<qrd<T, by_reference> >;
127
128  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
129public:
130  qrd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type st)
131    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
132      : base_type(rows, cols, st)
133    { VSIP_IMPL_COVER_TAG("qrd", use_type); }
134
135  ~qrd() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
136
137  // By-reference solvers.
138public:
139  template <mat_op_type       tr,
140	    product_side_type ps,
141	    typename          Block0,
142	    typename          Block1>
143  bool prodq(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
144    VSIP_NOTHROW
145  { return this->template impl_prodq<tr, ps>(b, x); }
146
147  template <mat_op_type       tr,
148	    typename          Block0,
149	    typename          Block1>
150  bool rsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, T const alpha, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
151    VSIP_NOTHROW
152  { return this->template impl_rsol<tr>(b, alpha, x); }
153
154  template <typename          Block0,
155	    typename          Block1>
156  bool covsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
157    VSIP_NOTHROW
158  { return this->impl_covsol(b, x); }
159
160  template <typename          Block0,
161	    typename          Block1>
162  bool lsqsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, Matrix<T, Block1> x)
163    VSIP_NOTHROW
164  { return this->impl_lsqsol(b, x); }
165};
166
167
168
169// QR solver object (by-value).
170
171template <typename T>
172class qrd<T, by_value>
173  : public impl::Qrd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_qrd_impl<T>::use_type >
174{
175  typedef impl::Qrd_impl<T,true,typename impl::Choose_qrd_impl<T>::use_type >
176    base_type;
177
178  // Constructors, copies, assignments, and destructors.
179public:
180  qrd(length_type rows, length_type cols, storage_type st)
181    VSIP_THROW((std::bad_alloc))
182      : base_type(rows, cols, st)
183    {}
184
185  ~qrd() VSIP_NOTHROW {}
186
187  // By-value solvers.
188public:
189  template <mat_op_type       tr,
190	    product_side_type ps,
191	    typename          Block0>
192  Matrix<T>
193  prodq(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b)
194    VSIP_NOTHROW
195  {
196    length_type x_rows, x_cols;
197    if (ps == mat_lside)
198    {
199      x_rows = (this->qstorage() == qrd_saveq)     ? this->rows()    : 
200	       (tr == mat_trans || tr == mat_herm) ? this->columns() :
201	                                             this->rows();
202      x_cols = b.size(1);
203    }
204    else
205    {
206      x_rows = b.size(0);
207      x_cols = (this->qstorage() == qrd_saveq)     ? this->rows() : 
208	       (tr == mat_trans || tr == mat_herm) ? this->rows() :
209	                                             this->columns();
210    }
211
212    Matrix<T> x(x_rows, x_cols);
213    this->template impl_prodq<tr, ps>(b, x);
214    return x;
215  }
216
217  template <mat_op_type       tr,
218	    typename          Block0>
219  Matrix<T>
220  rsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b, T const alpha)
221    VSIP_NOTHROW
222  {
223    Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
224    this->template impl_rsol<tr>(b, alpha, x); 
225    return x;
226  }
227
228  template <typename          Block0>
229  Matrix<T>
230  covsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b)
231    VSIP_NOTHROW
232  {
233    Matrix<T> x(b.size(0), b.size(1));
234    this->impl_covsol(b, x);
235    return x;
236  }
237
238  template <typename          Block0>
239  Matrix<T>
240  lsqsol(const_Matrix<T, Block0> b)
241    VSIP_NOTHROW
242  {
243    Matrix<T> x(this->columns(), b.size(1));
244    this->impl_lsqsol(b, x);
245    return x;
246  }
247};
248
249
250
251} // namespace vsip
